name: docusaurus-plugin-typedoc
description: A Docusaurus v2 plugin to build API documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn run lint && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.build-and-test: yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.test:init: rimraf test/site && npx create-docusaurus@latest test/site classic
scripts.test:demo:start: yarn run build && cd test/site && yarn run start
scripts.test:demo:build: yarn run build && cd test/site && yarn run build && yarn run serve

author: Thomas Grey
